content.rendered:
Directed by Jeethu Joseph.

Written by Jeethu Joseph.

Cast Pranav Mohanlal(Aadhithya Mohan). Sharafudheen(Sarath Nair). Meghanadhan(Mani). Siddique(Mohan Das). Lena(Rosy Mohan). Anusree(Jaya Nair). Siju Wilson(Jayakrishnan (as Wilson Joseph)). Jagapathi Babu(Narayana Reddy). Aditi Ravi(Anjana). Tony Luke(Ebin Joseph). Sijoy Varghese(Sidharth). S.V. Krishna Shankar(Nadhir) . Mohanlal(Self). Antony Perumbavoor(Self). Krittika Pradeep(Anu). Shravan Satya(Pranav’s friend)

Language Malayalam.

Producers Antony Perumbavoor.

Production Aashirvad Cinemas.
